```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
master <- read_csv("master.csv")
improvement <- read_csv("full_improvement_update.csv")
```

```{r}
master <- master %>% left_join(improvement, by = "Parcel_Number")
```


```{r}
master <- master %>% filter(percent_complete >= 1.0)
```

```{r}
master <- master %>% select(-c(Appraisal_Date, percent_complete, X1.x, X1.y, row_num))
```

```{r}
master <- master %>% filter(between(sale_price, 20000, 705000),
                            (between(Land_Net_Acres, .05, 10)),
                             (between(square_feet, 190, 5000)),
                            bedrooms <= 6,
                            between(bathrooms, 1, 5),
                            between(stories, 1, 5))
                          
```


```{r}
skim(master)
```

```{r}
summary(master)
```

```{r}
master_test <- master %>% replace(c(withInSewerImprovement, near_firestation, near_healthcare, near_libraries, near_policestation, near_schools, near_waterplants), c(0,1), c("Y","N"))
```


```{r}
test <- master %>% select(sale_price, year_built, Land_Net_Acres, square_feet, fireplaces, stories, bathrooms, bedrooms, condition, quality)
```
